name: Taxi Space
description:
The taxi driver just wants to sleep. Why the sudden increase in customers? IN SPACE

Movement: Arrow Keys
Stop Other Ships: C

This is a slightly adapted version of my LD30 'Connected Worlds' entry.

I used http://github.grumdrig.com/jsfxr/ for sounds and http://beepbox.co for music. The font is http://www.kottke.org/plus/type/silkscreen/.
